restore.title: Restore
restore.no_results_text: Insert a pattern to search and press 'Search'
restore.too_many_results: Your search has produced {0} results. Try to reduce the results changing the pattern. (Max results: 500)

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.no_backups_found_desc: It seems that you have not configured any backup-data

docs.override_restore:
If checked the restored files will overwrite the current files.
If not checked the restored files will be created in the same path with date include in the name (Es. my-file-20190725-15:05:12).
